item.description:
The next BioIL event is scheduled for Thursday, January 27 at MIT. Please take a moment to RSVP and forward this invitation to other life sciences professionals who might be interested.

January Presenters:
1. NobelGen - Frank Feist - CEO
2. Microbot Medical - Harel Gadot - Co-Founder

When & Where:
Thursday, January 27, 6:30pm
MIT
70 Memorial Drive
Building E51 - Room 315
Cambridge, MA 02142

Agenda:
6:30-7:00pm Networking & Intros
7:00-8:00pm Presentations and Q&A
8:00-8:30pm Member Announcements & Networking
item.name: BioIL meets on Thurs, January 27, 6:30 @MIT
